VEvil.​AI.​AAIAgentEntity
MonoBehaviour
public abstract
VEvil.​AI.​AAIAgentEntity
VEvil.​GameLogic.​Units.​AUnitEntity

AAIAgentEntity is a "wrapper" for the NavMeshAgent and provide methods and events related.

Variables
temporaryTarget
private GameObject temporaryTarget

A temporary target that can be set in runtime, changing this value won't affect the mainTarget.

If no temporary target is assigned, the mainTarget will be used instead!

mainTarget
private GameObject mainTarget

The GameObject of the main target this AAIAgentEntity should follow.

settings
private AIAgentSettings settings
nextUpdateIn
private float nextUpdateIn

The time before the next internal update cycle of this AAIAgentEntity instance.

hasReachedDestination
private bool hasReachedDestination
onTargetModified
private Action<GameObject> onTargetModified

Invoked when the Target of this AAIAgentEntity has been modified.

"Arg 01" might be null if the Target has been set like so.

Parameter
Arg 01

The new Target.

onTargetReached
private Action onTargetReached

Invoked when the destination to the Target has been completed.

Properties
BaseAgent
public NavMeshAgent BaseAgent {
get;
private 
set
}

The NavMeshAgent component used by this AAIAgentEntity.

Target
[field: SerializeField]
public GameObject Target {
get;
private 
set
}

The target this AAIAgentEntity is currently following.

AllowMovement
public bool AllowMovement {
get;
private protected 
set
}

Should this AAIAgentEntity be able to move to its Target.

If Target is null, this AAIAgentEntity won't move. :)

Settings
public AIAgentSettings Settings {
get;
private protected 
set
}
TimeBetweenUpdates
public float TimeBetweenUpdates {
get;
set
}

The time in seconds between each updates of this AAIAgentEntity.

This value won't impact to call-rate of the OnUpdateAI virtual method.  You can tweak this value to make this AAIAgentEntity more/less reactive about targets modifications.

public event Action<GameObject> OnTargetModified {
add;
remove
}

public event Action OnTargetReached {
add;

}

OnAITargetModified
protected virtual void OnAITargetModified(
GameObject 
_newTarget
)

OnAITargetModified is called when the Target of this AAIAgentEntity has been modified.

Parameter
_newTarget
GameObject

The new Target.

OnAITargetReached
protected virtual void OnAITargetReached()

OnAITargetReached is called when the Target of this AAIAgentEntity has been reached.

OnAwakeAI
protected virtual void OnAwakeAI()

OnAwakeAI is called when an enabled script instance is being loaded.

OnStartAI
protected virtual void OnStartAI()

OnStartAI is called on the frame when a script is enabled just before any of the Update methods are called for the first frame.

OnEnableAI
protected virtual void OnEnableAI()

OnEnableAI is called when the object becomes enabled and active.

OnDisableAI
protected virtual void OnDisableAI()

OnDisableAI is called when the behaviour becomes disabled.

OnDestroyAI
protected virtual void OnDestroyAI()

Destroying the attached Behaviour will result in the game or Scene receiving OnDestroy.

OnUpdateAI
protected virtual void OnUpdateAI()

OnUpdateAI is called every frames.

OnFixedUpdateAI
protected virtual void OnFixedUpdateAI()

Frame-rate independent MonoBehaviour.FixedUpdate message for physics calculations.

OnLateUpdateAI
protected virtual void OnLateUpdateAI()

OnLateUpdateAI is called every frame, if the Behaviour is enabled.

GameObject 
_tempTarget
)

Set a temporary target this AAIAgentEntity should follow.

public void SetMainTarget(
GameObject 
_target
)

Set the main target this AAIAgentEntity should follow.

Revert and remove the temporary target.
